mapper.select: select gclaim_no as glno, goods_no as gno, mem_id as id, content, regidate, updatedate, status from gclaim
select gclaim_no as glno, goods_no as gno, mem_id as id, content, regidate, updatedate, status from gclaim where gclaim_no=#{glno}
mapper.insert: insert into gclaim(goods_no, mem_id, content, status) values(#{gno}, #{id}, #{content}, #{status})
